definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: High performance fly ash concrete is a kind of green building materials with vast development foreground.

sentences.english: The country thrusted the hardbound room policy actually to give the building materials market to bring the new opportunity.

sentences.english: Middle Density Fiberboard has been the main decorative product in the market.
